mapper.update: UPDATE TB_APP SET APP_VNM = #{appVnm}, APP_VRS = #{appVrs}, STAT = #{stat}, APP_OS = #{appOs}, UPT_DTTM = now(), UPT_ADM_SQ = #{uptAdmSq} WHERE APP_SQ = #{appSq}

mapper.select: SELECT B.HP_MD_NM AS MODEL, COUNT(B.HP_MD_NM) AS CNT FROM TB_MEM A JOIN TB_PUSH_USER_INFO B ON A.MEM_SQ = B.MEM_SQ WHERE 1=1 AND DATE(A.REG_DTTM) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{R_MONTHFROM},'%Y%m%d') AND DATE(A.REG_DTTM) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{R_MONTHTO}, '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY B.HP_MD_NM

SELECT SUM(IF(B.HP_OS = 'android',1,0)) AS ANDROIDCNT, SUM(IF(B.HP_OS = 'ios',1,0)) AS IOSCNT FROM TB_MEM A JOIN TB_PUSH_USER_INFO B ON A.MEM_SQ = B.MEM_SQ WHERE 1=1 AND DATE(A.REG_DTTM) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{R_MONTHFROM},'%Y%m%d') AND DATE(A.REG_DTTM) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{R_MONTHTO}, '%Y%m%d')

SELECT SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-SUBSTRING(MEM_BIR,1,4) BETWEEN 10 AND 19 , 1, 0)) AS AGE_10, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-SUBSTRING(MEM_BIR,1,4) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 , 1, 0)) AS AGE_20, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-SUBSTRING(MEM_BIR,1,4) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 , 1, 0)) AS AGE_30, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-SUBSTRING(MEM_BIR,1,4) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 , 1, 0)) AS AGE_40, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-SUBSTRING(MEM_BIR,1,4) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 , 1, 0)) AS AGE_50, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-SUBSTRING(MEM_BIR,1,4) BETWEEN 60 AND 69 , 1, 0)) AS AGE_60, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-SUBSTRING(MEM_BIR,1,4) BETWEEN 70 AND 79 , 1, 0)) AS AGE_70, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-SUBSTRING(MEM_BIR,1,4) BETWEEN 80 AND 89 , 1, 0)) AS AGE_80, SUM(IF(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y')-SUBSTRING(MEM_BIR,1,4) BETWEEN 90 AND 99 , 1, 0)) AS AGE_90 FROM TB_MEM WHERE 1=1 AND DATE(REG_DTTM) >= STR_TO_DATE(#{R_MONTHFROM},'%Y%m%d') AND DATE(REG_DTTM) <= STR_TO_DATE(#{R_MONTHTO}, '%Y%m%d')

SELECT TUT_SQ, TUT_NM, TUT_CONT, IF(STAT='01','노출','비노출') AS STATCODE, DATE_FORMAT(REG_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS REG_DTTM FROM TB_TUT WHERE STAT != '03'
AND REG_DTTM BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate},' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
AND TUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
ORDER BY STAT,${orderBy} LIMIT ${R_PAGE} , ${R_ROW}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_TUT WHERE 1=1
AND REG_DTTM BETWEEN CONCAT(#{startDate},' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
AND TUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
